Hi Bonnie,

The Haven Inspired staging website is now setup and ready for you to review.

Logins:
Username: your email
Password:  p$yczqaOgzc5Nrj*07oTvxIb
Link: https://haveninspired.wolfiq.cloud/wp-admin/

A couple of items to note:

  • The scrolling call out banner in the header needs to be updated with relevant copy for these brochure style websites. Let me know what you have in mind?
  • The social media icons are just place holders. They can be removed if they are not needed.
  • There is some holding copy in suggested areas, such as the FAQs on the home page. Again, these can be removed if not needed.

Please let me know if you need anything else at this stage?
